001package org.nasdanika.drawio;
002
003import java.util.Map;
004import java.util.function.BiFunction;
005import java.util.function.Consumer;
006import java.util.stream.Stream;
007
008import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
009import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
010
011/**
012 * {@link Document} element, including the Document itself, backed by {@link org.w3c.dom.Element}.
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016public interface Element extends org.nasdanika.graph.Element, Marked {
017        
018        /**
019         * @return The underlying XML element.
020         */
021        org.w3c.dom.Element getElement();
022        
023        /**
024         * Accepts the visitor in children first (bottom-up) way.
025         * @param visitor
026         */
027        default void accept(Consumer<? super Element> visitor, ConnectionBase connectionBase) {
028                accept((e, cr) -> { visitor.accept(e); return null; }, connectionBase);
029        }
030        
031        /**
032         * Accepts a result producing visitor {@link BiFunction}. Passes to it a map of results collected from children, nulls are not included.   
033         * @param <T>
034         * @param visitor
035         * @return result returned by the visitor.
036         */
037        <T> T accept(BiFunction<Element, Map<Element, T>, T> visitor, ConnectionBase connectionBase);
038                
039        @Override
040        default <T> T accept(BiFunction<? super org.nasdanika.graph.Element, Map<? extends org.nasdanika.graph.Element, T>, T> visitor) {
041                BiFunction<Element, Map<Element, T>, T> visitorAdapter = (element, childMappings) -> {
042                        return visitor.apply(element, childMappings);
043                };
044                return accept(visitorAdapter, ConnectionBase.PARENT);
045        }
046        
047        /**
048         * @return Stream containing this element and its children.
049         */
050        default Stream<Element> stream(ConnectionBase connectionBase) {
051                BiFunction<Element, Map<Element, Stream<Element>>, Stream<Element>> visitor = (element, childMappings) -> {
052                        return childMappings.values().stream().reduce(Stream.of(element), (a,b) -> Stream.concat(a, b));
053                };
054                return accept(visitor, connectionBase);
055        }; 
056        
057        /**
058         * 
059         * @return Element URI for resolving relative references, e.g. links to documentation. 
060         */
061        URI getURI();   
062
063}
